content.en_US:
Powerful [[external heat source|External Heat Source]] usually used by nuclear reactory that employ a form of [[coolant|Perfluoromethyl]] instead of making [[steam|Steam]] outright. Produces usable heats by using hot fluids and cooling them down in the process.

The top field in the GUI is for the amount of fluid used per cycle, the bottom field is for the tick delay between cycles for fine-tuning.
